alert.note: Alert for Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 18 at 3:35PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Graham and southern Greenlee Counties through 415 PM MST... At 334 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm about 12 miles east of Safford, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Jose and York. This includes the following highways... Route 70 between mile markers 347 and 374. Route 75 between mile markers 385 and 396. Route 191 between mile markers 131 and 153. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford
